txt.en:
'I am ashamed to be admitting this, but I'm out of twine, [placeholder]. I, Master Boot-maker of the Garden Shrew Stomping event....

'It is true. Hard to believe, I know. Could...could you please fetch me some more? I usually get mine in Celondim, where the Elves who tend the docks craft a fine strong thread.

'You are a good sort of [placeholder], [placeholder]. Truly.'
'Twine! Marvellous. I was beginning to wonder if you lost your way. Well, this should do for a short while, at least. My thanks, [placeholder]. You are more useful than you seem at first glance!'
'Oh...you're still here. Maybe you didn't hear me correctly: I am out of twine. Not wine. Not brine. Twine. Please get me some more.'

The boot-maker for the shrew-stomping event has need of twine for his late supply of boots.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Elf-made twine can be found in Celondim, on and around the docks.\n\nYou should collect twine from Celondim for the making of shrew-stomping boots.
Deluraw, the boot-maker of the Shrew Stomping event, can be found in Duillond near the ovens.\n\nYou should bring the twine you collected to Deluraw.
